newsitem.title: USA: Data Systems FY96 net loss $0.28/share.
newsitem.headline: Data Systems FY96 net loss $0.28/share.

text.p: Data Systems & Software Inc on Monday reported a net loss of $2 million, or $0.28 per share, compared with net income excluding non-recurring gains of $3.4 million, or $0.46 per share, in 1995.
It said the net loss resulted from a decrease in operating income and a tax expense of $1.5 million associated with a dividend from its Tower subsidiary.
The company said 1996 operating income decreased to $6 million in 1996 compared with $20.4 million in 1995.
It said sales rose to $131.8 million compared with $129.8 million in 1995, but that gross profit fell to $29.7 million in 1996 compared with $39.0 million in 1995.

It blamed the decrease in gross profit on decreased gross profit in the semiconductor segment, resulting from increased direct costs from expanding the capacity of its semiconductor manufacturing facility and the operation of the facility below capacity during the second half of 1996.

The company attributed the decrease in operating income primarily to decreased operating income of the semiconductor segment and expenses from introducing its Professional Help Desk and Cybrcard products.
